actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates of disability compensation for disabled veterans by 20 percent.

summary.text: Increases the rates of disability compensation for service-connected disabilities of veterans. Increases by 20 percent the basic disability compensation, and the dependency allowances payable to veterans with disabilities rated 50 percent or more.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates of disability compensation for disabled veterans by 20 percent.
